pkgmetadata.longdescription: OpenTelemetry System Metrics Instrumentation============================================|pypi|.. |pypi| image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/opentelemetry-instrumentation-system-metrics.svg :target: https://pypi.org/project/opentelemetry-instrumentation-system-metrics/Instrumentation to collect system performance metrics.Installation------------:: pip install opentelemetry-instrumentation-system-metricsReferences----------* `OpenTelemetry System Metrics Instrumentation <https://opentelemetry-python-contrib.readthedocs.io/en/latest/instrumentation/system_metrics/system_metrics.html>`_* `OpenTelemetry Project <https://opentelemetry.io/>`_
